profile:
Welcome to Toronto Drains & Waterproofing! Our services are backed by a 100% satisfaction guarantee. Contact us today to schedule your appointment. 

Camera Inspections

Cutting edge camera equipment with location services
All pipe sizes between 2-10 inches no matter the style of piping (clay, PVC, ABS, cast iron, copper)
Continuous drain backups – we utilize a camera to pinpoint any and all issues in your drainage system

Drain Replacement 

Underground Drain Replacement and Repairs
Removal of older damaged piping causing backups and damage to the home
Trenchless technology for piping replacements (pipe bursting)
Installation of backwater valves
Spot repairs, up to full line replacements



Backed Up and Clogged Drains

We will fully repair the cause of the following symptoms, at their source:
Basement main drain backing up with sewage spilling out of the floor drains onto your finished and unfinished basements
Water backups out of sink drains
(Temporary) water pools around shower drain
Toilet bowl water bubbles when running the sink or shower
Slow draining of water from your bathtub, sink or other fixture (can indicate a clog, even if a backup hasn’t yet been exposed)
Gurgling sounds from drains, especially after running washing machine or dishwasher
Any mysterious puddles of water on floor near a tub, sink or floor drain


Wet Basements

Installation of basement flood protection device such as a Backwater valve or sump pump system
Exterior waterproofing with the installation of new weeping system
Interior waterproofing
Sump pits and pumps
We will also fully repair the cause of the following symptoms, at their source:
Water seeping through your foundation walls (may rise up through the floors)
Heavy rains or flash floods causing you to have a wet and mouldy basement
